data.title: Jim Thompson farm celebrates Isan culture
data.description: While enjoying winter temperatures, visitors to Nakhon Ratchasima can immerse in a charming Isan-style town surrounded by lush mountain ranges and beautiful flower fields as part of Jim Thompson Farm 2024: Isan Calling, which runs from Dec 7 until Jan 1.

data.title: Preserving the past
data.description: On Nov 17, a group of individuals with a shared passion for history and culture gathered at the wonderful Fazal Building in Bangkok for the exclusive opening of "New Century - The E.M. Katib Legacy".

data.title: Court okays detention of Dr Boon’s wife, daughter in huge fraud case
data.description: The police and victims are against bail for fear of them fleeing or tampering with evidence; testimony from 10 additional witnesses pending

data.title: Khao Kradong dispute: Authority of land revocation body faces query
data.description: House panel chaired by People’s Party MP to address Buri Ram land dispute, as state land department calls on SRT to prove ownership

data.title: NESDC releases Q3 2024 Thai Social Conditions Report
data.description: Household-debt growth slowed, amounting to 16.32 trillion baht, with a growth rate of 1.3%,

data.title: Experts urge Thailand to create its own streaming hub to rival Netflix
data.description: Media professionals say a domestic platform would enable Thailand’s thriving content creation industry to reach international market

data.title: Thailand targets unsafe beta-agonist use in meat industry
data.description: Department to launch a campaign to teach livestock farmers about the dangers of using drugs to make the meat of their animals redder

data.title: Unlock the Power of Play with Nintendo | The Nation in Brief
data.description: The gaming scene in Thailand has reached a new high with the opening of the country’s first Nintendo Authorized Store at Siam Paragon.

data.title: More protests will only harm the economy, Phumtham tells Sondhi
data.description: Defence minister encourages former PAD leader to take the legal route, saying Pheu Thai is ready to fight any challenge

data.title: Baan Dalaa x Grok 1970 | The Nation Lifestyle
data.description: Baan Dalaa by Angkana and Grok 1970 celebrate the richness of Thai ingredients by creating 12 exclusive cross-cultural dishes inspired by the provinces of Surat Thani and Ratchaburi. Each dish reflects their artistry and inspiration.

data.title: People’s Party gains ground in Udon Thani despite loss in CEO poll
data.description: Buoyed by strong voter support at the Sunday election, ex-Move Forward leader believes the opposition party will win at least one House seat in the Northeast province

data.title: Thai farmers urged to embrace smart farming technologies
data.description: Agricultural Extension Department launches new initiative in partnership with Siam Kubota

data.title: Schools must address diversity: expert says
data.description: Intercultural strategist tells parents of kids at international schools that diversity is about far more than LGBTQ+

data.title: International schools can be a soft power for Thailand
data.description: International schools have the potential to become Thailand’s soft power by attracting expats wanting to study here and thus generating revenue for the country, the International Schools Association of Thailand (ISAT) said in an interview on Friday (November 22).

data.title: Matchanuland: a convenient day trip from Bangkok
data.description: Matchanuland features four themed zones, each designed to offer unique learning experiences

data.title: Palang Pracharath’s Samart arrested over money laundering allegations
data.description: DSI nabs former deputy spokesman in Chiang Rai on charges of laundering money for iCon Group, after arresting his mother for being an accomplice

data.title: Experience a Thai-Style Christmas Spectacular at King Power
data.description: As global tourism springs back to life, King Power, Thailand's premier travel retail destination, is transforming its Rangnam location into a magical winter wonderland with an extraordinary Thai twist.

data.title: Phu Hin Rong Kla park blooms with rainbow of everlasting daisies
data.description: Visitors chill out amid colourful displays and cooling temperatures at Royal project in the forested hills of Phitsanulok

data.title: BOI roadshow in Shanghai grabs interest of 600+ Chinese companies
data.description: BOI secretary-general says six companies in three targeted industries have also discussed the possibility of investing over 90 billion baht in Thailand

data.title: Thai soldiers rescue Chinese man trapped in well near Myanmar border
data.description: Troops were enforcing measures along Thai-Myanmar border to prevent illegal entry, drug smuggling

data.title: Paetongtarn calls on Thais to not tolerate any domestic violence
data.description: The Thai premier calls on society to unite against violence towards women and children on the International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women

data.title: Phu Hin Rong Kla park blooms with rainbow of everlasting daisies
data.description: Visitors chill out amid colourful displays and cooling temperatures at Royal project in the forested hills of Phitsanulok

data.title: Arrest warrant issued for politician over iCon scandal
data.description: Former Palang Pracharath Party spokesman Samart Janechaijitwanit accused of money laundering in alleged pyramid selling scheme

data.title: Global awareness of value-based healthcare trend at BDMS 2024 Annual Academic Meeting
data.description: Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited (BDMS) recently hosted a conference aimed at fostering the exchange of medical knowledge, highlighting the concept of patient-centric care in conjunction with Value-Based Healthcare, a growing global trend in the healthcare industry.

data.title: Bosch receives the Prime Minister’s road safety award
data.description: Bangkok, Thailand – Bosch has been recognized with the Prime Minister’s Road Safety Award for its efforts in promoting road safety in Thailand. The award was presented by Deputy Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul at the 16th National Academic Road Safety seminar.

data.title: Monkey business reigns as Lopbui’s macaques enjoy annual feast
data.description: Bananas, watermelons, corn, lettuce and desserts on the menu as tourists and locals treat the monkeys to a slap-up buffet

data.title: Loyalty to King underlined at rehearsal for annual parade
data.description: King’s Guards prepare for annual parade and oath-taking ceremony at rehearsal led by Her Majesty Queen Suthida

data.title: Pheu Thai beats People’s Party in Udon Thani PAO election
data.description: Bhumjaithai Party’s Warin Chinwong claims victory in Nakhon Si Thammarat while Chaiya Angkinan is re-elected in Phetchaburi

data.title: Thailand’s Atthaya Thitikul wins CME Group Tour Championship
data.description: The 21-year old clinches the title at the final hole over American golfer Angel Yin and takes home a whopping US$4 million in prize money

data.title: Is being alone so bad? Befriending ChatGPT and embracing the art of solitude
data.description: For the longest time, 43-year-old Eric Feng did not consider himself a lonely person. How could he be lonely when he was never alone?

data.title: Key points on the new funding deal from the UN climate talks agreement
data.description: In the wee hours Sunday at the United Nations climate talks, countries from around the world reached an agreement on how rich countries can cough up the funds to support poor countries in the face of climate change.
